IMUSim
Package imusim :: Package maths

Package maths

source code

Code implementing pure mathematical functionality.

Submodules
  • imusim.maths.integrators: Iterative integrator implementations.
  • imusim.maths.kalman: Standard and unscented Kalman filters.
  • imusim.maths.matrices: Utilities for working with matrices.
  • imusim.maths.natural_neighbour: Cython wrapper for natural neighbour C implementation.
  • imusim.maths.quat_splines: Spline fitting of quaternion data.
  • imusim.maths.quaternions: Quaternion maths.
  • imusim.maths.splines: Spline fitting.
  • imusim.maths.transforms: Mathematical transforms.
  • imusim.maths.vector_fields: Classes for modelling 3D vector fields.
  • imusim.maths.vector_splines: Spline fitting of vector data.
  • imusim.maths.vectors: Functions for working with column vectors.
